title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7000.8 - Confidentiality of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 7000.8 - Confidentiality of records

State Regulations

The confidentiality of the commission's
records shall be governed by section
45
of the

Judiciary Law. Disciplining staff for breaches of confidentiality shall be
governed by procedures set forth in section
46
of the

Judiciary Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
7000.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
